start.text: 🏃‍♂️ Bus Stop gang is running through the college corridor! They have 10 minutes to submit the project to Bhumika Ma’am!
options: Check canteen where Andya might be hiding

jaremon_node.text: 🧠 Jaremon: 'Bro, I printed the report but page numbers are... Sanskrit numerals!'

fix_pages.text: You reprinted, but forgot the last page. Now Jaremon is taping pages with Feviquick! 🤦‍♂️
options: Run to Kissu for code check
Ask Tukkya to distract Bhumika Ma'am

andya_node.text: 🍜 Andya: 'Bhai chill kar... ek chai ek samosa toh banta hai viva se pehle!'

chai_trap.text: Samosa spicy tha, Andya hiccuped loudly near staffroom. Bhumika Ma'am noticed! 😬

tukkya_node.text: 🎭 Tukkya: 'Bro I’m ready with mimicry! Should I act like principal or peon?'

laugh_divert.text: Tukkya tried to mimic Ma’am accidentally 😶. Crowd laughed... Ma’am smiled awkwardly.

niggasaurus_node.text: 🎨 Niggasaurus: 'This design is SO dry. Where are the GIFs? Where’s Comic Sans?!'

comic_font.text: Now it’s Comic Sans everywhere. Niggasaurus: 'Perfect. Now it screams PASSION!' 🔥

kissu_node.text: 💻 Kissu: 'Code chalega… par docx ka naam 'finalFINALv3_NEWREAL_FINAL.docx' kyun hai?'

rename_success.text: Now the file is 'Project_MCC_Submission.pdf'. Kissu is finally impressed. ✅

pretend.text: Kissu shrugged and sent the file anyway. Confidence level = fake it till you make it. 😅
options: Ask Andya for good luck samosa

viva_room.text: 📋 Bhumika Ma’am: 'Team, are you ready?' She smiles. The air is intense, but respectful.

respect_team.text: Ma’am: 'Good. I appreciate honest effort. But I’ll ask each of you 1 question!' 😬

exit.text: 🎉 Project submitted! Bhumika Ma’am: 'Well done, team. I'm proud of you.' The squad exits smiling and hungry. 🥳
